## findValueForKey() function

Searches the provided object for the provided key.

Smarter than a normal obj\[key\] as key can also be a regex.

In the cases where a regex is broad (".\*") but there is also an exact match, the exact match is preferred.

  V

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function findValueForKey<V>(key: string, obj: ObjectWithKeys<V>): V | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string |  |
|  obj | [ObjectWithKeys](./stentor-utils.objectwithkeys.md)<!-- -->&lt;V&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

V \| undefined
